Reviews.Title: Charger won't work in the US
Reviews.Author: MarvinK
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine with both voice and data (I was able to configure it to work with a 3rd party GSM provider), but the phone sold by JustDealsToday was obviously meant for delivery in the Middle East and the charger plug will only fit European outlets--an adapter was NOT included to fit standard US outlet plugs (just so you know what you are getting), so I can only charge it through a computer that supplies power through USB.The screen is awesome.  WiFi, GPS, Mobile Data, Bluetooth, Camera, Sync and FM Radio all work fine.

Reviews.Title: The charger was damage
Reviews.Author: Jaime Acosta
Reviews.Content: I Buy two phones, one of them had the charger damaged, hence all good, arrived on time .. The phone is very light and very fast. Although I do not like the color, but it is a very good cell
